name: Cornerstone Academy
description: On Campus childhood education with Preschool, Kindergarten to 5th Grade, 6th to 8th Grade programs. Campus includes modern classrooms, cafeteria, playground, and private parking lot convenient for pick up and drop off. Bilingual Chinese-English program introduces children to Cantonese and Mandarin and curriculum integrates technology, culture, and fitness.
